description: The air around foe shimmers. Pfft.
Hot wind makes foe uncomfortable.
Foe covers his face and leaps aside. You have initiative.
Blast stings foe's hands and arms. You have the initiative.
Foe's chest and side heat up and garments smolder from assault. He will be easily kindled if you strike again.
Hot winds dance around foe parching his exposed skin. He puts up a desperate defence.
Clothes smoke, then burn. Foe flails his arms trying to put them out. The pain edures longer than the flames.
Spark sets a piece of foe's equipment on fire. Foe must remove the item.
Assault ignites foe's back. Equipment crackles as it burns and falls clear.
Well placed. Strike slams into foe's weapon arm. Garments are burned. Foe's evasion is comical.
Flame grapples foe's shield and chest. The wound is grave and infection will follow.
Toast foe's side and send him stumbling back 5 feet away from you. He blocks his face against any renewed assault.
Fire consumes garments and hair. Blinding smoke keeps foe's defenses poorly aligned.
Foe's shield side engulfed in flame. Foe's shield but it will be kindled if wooden.
Foe exposes his back while evading the strike. Blast scorches a small wound in his shoulder blade.
Assault to foe's lower leg consumes covering. Foe falls down. One leg is on fire.
Blow to foe's head. If he has helmet it heats up like a furnace and must be painfully removed. Foe ears and cheeks are burned.
Blast lands on the weapon arm and climbs up to foe's neck. It burns all it touches. If foe has any organic neck covering it is destroyed.
Brutally scar the side of foe's face. Foe is knocked out. He loses 50 from his Appearance and 25 from his Presence.
Attack is wild and boils nearby water.
Singe foe's exposed skin. The heat dies quick. Foe is not impressed.
Foe simmers in his clothes. He is unfocused and you have initiative.
Assault blinds foe for a moment. You have 2 rounds of initiative.
Fire laden blast forces foe back. Any containers of water boil and burst open. You have 2 rounds of initiative.
Foe's shield side is swathed in fire. He may use a shield to avoid the attack, but it combust. Shield hand is burned.
Foe evades most of the damage with some grace. The remainder scorches his side lightly.
Foe ducks; attack torches back and the ground behind him. He is shaken.
Engulf foe in flame and smoke. The flames die down; foe escapes death.
Concentrated strike burns through foe's leg. The flames do not last but foe's skin is exposed. Skin blisters.
Fire lands along side foe's face. His hair, cheek, and ear are engulfed. Foe throws himself to the ground.
Flames seek out foe with a predator's lust. He throws garments and equipment off franticly to satisfy the blaze. Foe is busy staying alive.
Chest and arm blast damages organic armor and engulfs any wood on foe. Metal armor heats up painfully.
Abdomen entangled in flames. The flames will spread upward next turn if not extinguished. Foe sees the danger.
Strike knocks foe down on his back. The flames do not endure but much equipment is burned or crushed.
Leg covering is set on fire by blast. It spreads quickly and foe is in trouble. The flames will grow if not put out.
Head strike. Force of blast removes any helmet worn. Hair, scalp and skin burn. Smoke and flame blind foe for 3 rnds.
Flames burn into foe's throat. The damage is frightening. Foe's neck collapses in the flames. He drops and dies in 9 inactive rnds. He smells bad.
Assault consumes clothing and tissue. Foe's arms and chest are without skin. Foe is paralyzed. Infection will follow.
Hot smoke makes foe's eyes red.
Sparks and smoke dance all over foe. He waves them off with little effort.
Foe suspects that he is on fire. He is wrong. You gain the initiative.
Hair and bowstrings are singed. You have 2 rounds of initiative.
Disorient foe with a tricky shot. Garments smolder suspiciously. He checks them carefully; guard is still up.
Heat catchs foe in lower leg. You gain initiative while foe regains his balance. The pain stays with him.
Flame spreads up foe's side and snaps at his arm and face. Exposed areas are lightly burned.
Hard strike to side, armor does not help. Blow leaves a blistering mark.
Strong blast hits foe in legs; they nearly give with pain. He recoils 5 ft.
Flames burst against foe's side. He stumbles but does not fall. He tries to smother the fire with his garments.
Blaze consumes garments on weapon arm. Any metal covering heats up. Foe falls from the blast.
Back blast. Foe drops to one knee and then rises again with some difficulty. Some of his garments still smoke from the assault. Skin is blistered badly.
Chest blast. Organic armor is destroyed. Metal armor should be removed quickly.
Strike engulfs foe's most exposed hand and burns it without mercy. Hand is useless. Arm clothing is destroyed.
Violent inferno destroys organic armor and ruins metal armor on leg. Much of the blast tumbles clear after impact.
Foe's shield side is devoured by flames. Head, arm, side, and leg have critical burns. If foe has a shield, it is destroyed in place of his arm.
Trapped in the furnace of your blast, foe is overcome and falls down. He is unconsious and still burning.
Intense heat fuses metal, cloth and skin. Foe is unrecognizable. If no chest armor he is dead instantly. Otherwise he dies after 9 rounds of burning.
Strike to foe's head. If he has a helmet, his head is broiled and he dies in 2 rnds. If no helmet he dies instantly.
Foe evades the embrace of the flames.
Flames surround foe. He seems to step out of them unharmed.
Foe is enshrouded by smoke. The heat harms him little. You have initiative.
Foe strikes out at the flames to protect himself. It seems to work well enough.
With a burst of flame, you cover foe with heated air. Foe jumps back to avoid any additional wounds.
Cover foe with a flash fire. Exposed skin burns. The flames bite deep and the pain is great. (if not wet/if wet)
Assault lands on foe's weapon arm. He makes a supreme effort to pull his arm away. Foe is unable to protect himself.
Foe is aflame and takes damage for 3 rounds while he burns.
Flames dance around foe's head. He seeks to get clear and almost falls.
Foe's shield arm and shield are on fire. Dropping the shield only helps a little. The flames cling to his garements.
Foe's face and weapon hand are scalded. Foe is having trouble opening his eyes.
Foe leaps back from your deadly inferno. He escapes death but falls on his back. He is prone for 1 round. Minor arm burns.
Foe's weapon arm is a conflagration. Hand and arm are useless. Muscles and nerves are damaged.
Foe's side is ignited by your strike and the wounds are deep. He smothers the fire but the damage is done.
Foe's arms and chest embrace your infernal strike. Arms are useless and foe's skin is open to the air.
Blast engulfs lower half of foe's body. If foe has abdominal armor, he is knocked out. If not, he dies in 12 inactive rounds from organ damage.
Flames assault upper body. If foe has a full helm, he is blinded and in a coma for 2 days. If not, he dies in 6 rounds due to shock and brain damage.
Foe is trapped in the furnace made by your attack. Organs are destroyed and foe's blood boils. He has no hope of survival and dies in 6 inactive rounds.
Every part of foe is ablaze. He dies in 2 rounds, making terrifying noises. He continues to burn for 12 rounds.
Foe avoids the blast but not the heat.
Sweltering heat reachs out for foe. He evades. You have initiative.
Flash unbalances foe and sends him on the defensive. You have initiative.
Foe fails to avoid some of the attack and almost falls down.
Blister foe's weapon arm. He gives ground to escape the heat. His footing is better than you had hoped.
Strike to side and back ignite foe's cloak and pack. Neck and shoulder are lightly burned.
Foe blocks flames with his weapon. A wooden weapon is destroyed. A metal weapon becomes too hot to hold.
Your flames reach out. Foe frantically leaps back . His chest is burned.
Garments over foe's shoulders and head are set afire. He is frantic.
Searing strike to foe's legs. Exposed skin and muscle is burned. Infection will follow. Foe struggles to stay up.
Foe's combustible garments turn him into a torch. He runs a short distance, drops and dies in 6 rounds.
Blast leaps onto foe's shield arm. Any shield foe has and his arm are on fire. The heat penetrates deep and foe's face shows it.
Strike center of foe's chest. Flame spills in all directions. Foe is knocked down. Chest armor is destroyed.
Blast lands on foe's side but spreads to arms and legs. A shield prevents arm damage but his hands are burned off.
Foe inhales flames scalding lungs and throat Foe is active for 12 rnds (while he burns), then dies.
Foe's lower body is badly burned. Nerves, organs and tissue destroyed. Foe is paralyzed and will die in 9 rounds from shock and dehydration.
Foe is cremated before your very eyes. He remains standing for 6 rounds and then drops and dies. A small fire lingers over the remains. A horrible end.
Your foe is devoured by a hellfire of which even you are frightened. All combustibles within 10 ft ignite. Little will remain when the fire dies.
Fire devours every part of foe in an instant. Bits of metal, teeth and a few bones shower to the ground.
